DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim of this study is to develop and test a psychodynamic Internet--delivered psychological treatment for patients with social anxiety disorder and compare its efficacy to a waiting list.
DOC.brief_title: Internet-delivered Psychodynamic Therapy for Social Anxiety Disorder (SOFIA)
DOC.detailed_description: Participants with social anxiety disorder (MINI telephone interview) will be recruited via mass media and randomly allocated to psychodynamic Internet--delivered psychological treatment or to a waiting list control condition.
DOC.criteria: Social anxiety disorder as diagnosed by the MINI diagnostic interview Severe depression
